messages.title: Chloe's pledge to you
messages.content: Chloe has years of experience serving you as Norwich North's MP and has helped thousands of people. She gets things done across Norwich North.

messages.title: Investment in Norwich
messages.content: Chloe gets results. She's led the battle for better rail, securing £14 million for better services to London. This investment will mean three new trains an hour from Norwich.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest. With a strong negotiating hand, I can deliver for you and for Britain.
Build a stronger economy that rewards people who work hard and creates secure and well-paid jobs.
Provide real opportunity and support for all. Fix the mental health system and ensure better life chances for everyone.
